definitions.body: ad fin., and [[סַר]] infr.); of loose woman [[הׂמִיׇּסה הִיא]] [[וְסוֹרָָרֶת]] Pr 7:11; as subst. = the stubborn, Ps 66:7, Ps 68:7, Ps 68:19; fs. [[וַיִּתְּנוּ כָתֵף סׂרֶ֫רֶת]] Ne 9:29 and they presented a stubborn shoulder (of Isr.) = Zec 7:11 ([[סׂרָָרֶת]]).
